text: Embertoniphanta farafanga or Helicophanta farafanga is a species of air- breathing land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropods mollusk in the family Acavidae. The species occurs in Madagascar. Helicophanta farafanga is a burrower.Emberton K. C. (1994). "Morphology and aestivation behaviour in some Madagascan acavid land snails". Biological Journal of the Linnean Society 53(2): 175-187. . ==References== Category:Acavidae Category:Gastropods described in 1875
title: Embertoniphanta farafanga
